name: TG File Sharing Bot
description: File sharing bot.. access files privately through specific links..!

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

APP_ID.description: your app id, take it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: your api hash, take it from my.telegram.org

CHANNEL_ID.description: make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin in channel, and it's id

FORCE_CHANNEL.description: id of the first channel, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

FORCE_CHANNEL2.description: id of the second channel, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

FORCE_CHANNEL3.description: id of the second channel, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

START_MSG.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format
START_MSG.value: Hello {first} I am Madara Uchiha a file store bot Made for @Anime_Bloodline ‚ö°

FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.description: Optional: Force Sub message of bot, use HTML parsemode format
FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.value: Sorry Dude You're Not Joined My Channel üòê So Please Join Our Update Channel To Continue Watching Your Favourite Animes ‚ö°

PROTECT_CONTENT.description: True means no forward else False
